meanings.sent1: The ridgels on the shell of the turtle helped protect it.
meanings.sent2: I traced my finger along the ridgels of the tree bark.
meanings.sent3: The ridgels on the puzzle piece made it easy to fit into place.
meanings.sent4: Her wrinkled hands resembled the ridgels of a mountain range.
meanings.sent5: The ridgels on the sand dune created a beautiful pattern in the sunlight.
